name: Polygon Helicopter Physics Web Demo
description:
Demo version for pre-buying test purposes. Try the physics and all the mechanics yourself before you buy the asset!

Asset link : 

Simple and Intuitive Helicopter Physics. Ready to fly in 5 minutes!

You can take advantage of the highly-detailed demo model which is already waiting for you and is ready to fly or you can use your own plane and make it fly in less then 5 minutes! Get creative and make perfect handling for your airplane and this asset will help you with that!
